definitions.title: n.[m.] du.
definitions.body: two kinds (Ar. kila0ni, kila0 both; Eth. kl0e: two; perh. also [[כלאי]] MI:23 both, two, Nö:LCB 1889, 61, cf Dr:Sm xcii; Sm u. So:MI, 1886 suggest reservoirs; v. also [[כְּלִי]])—[[בְּהֶמְתְּ ְלאׁ]] ´[[תַּרְבִּיעַ כ]] Le 19:19 not cause thy cattle to breed (in) two kinds; ´[[שָֽׂדְ ְלאׁ תִּזְרַע כ]] v:Le 19:19 (H); [[לאׁ תִּזְרַע]] ´[[כַּרְמְ ְכ]] De 22:9 (both [[כִּלְאָָיִם]]); ´[[בֶּגֶד כ]] Le 19:19 (H);—only in law of H and D against mixtures.
